Name: Deepwood Memories
Title: Knowledge of the Vine: Deepwood Memories
Desc: "For all those who follow nature must pass through the maze of the forest and reach that endless plain."

Talent.Name: Deepwood Memories
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
